author: wn.com
title: Sigma Xi awards David R. Williams the William Procter Prize for Scientific Achievement (University of ...
text: ( Source : University of Rochester ) October 23 , 2015 David R. Williams , widely regarded as one of the world's leading experts on human vision, has been named the recipient of Sigma Xi's 2015 William Procter Prize for Scientific Achievement.
